英文法規名稱: Standard for the Tolerance of Heavy Metals in Edible Offal of Cattle, Sheep, Pig and Poultry
中文法規名稱: 牛羊豬及家禽可食性內臟重金屬限量標準

法規內容.條文內容: This Standard is prescribed in accordance with the provisions of Article 17 of the Act Governing Food Sanitation.

Maximum tolerance of heavy metals:
┌────────────────┬─────────────┐
│Heavy metal                     │Lead                      │
├────────────────┼─────────────┤
│Maximumtolerance                │0.5                       │
│（ppm, wet weight basis）       │                          │
└────────────────┴─────────────┘
This Standard shall be implemented from the date of promulgation.
